interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " I'm Not Here " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Condoms in the Sand " .

progression.synopsis: When Sensei and Makoto get back to the inn, they find Miku already asleep. The three share the bed but, in the middle of the night, Miku accidentally wakes Sensei up as she shifts around.
trivia: Although this is one of Miku's events, all the other events in the chain belong to Makoto (the previous one being I'm Not Here and the next one being Something, Somewhere ).

changelog: This Event was added in Update .16p1.
